## Description {#details}

Serialize the remarks to YAML.

One remark entry looks like this: â€” !&lt;TYPE&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a>: &lt;PASSNAME&gt; Name: &lt;REMARKNAME&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a>: &#123; File: &lt;SOURCEFILENAME&gt;, Line: &lt;SOURCELINE&gt;, Column: &lt;SOURCECOLUMN&gt; &#125; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>: &lt;FUNCTIONNAME&gt; Args:
<ul>
<li>&lt;KEY&gt;:</li>
</ul>


<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a>: &#123; File: &lt;FILE&gt;, Line: &lt;LINE&gt;, Column: &lt;COL&gt; &#125; ...
